product_name: Deuter Futura Pro 34 SL Pack - Women's
long_description: The Deuter Futura Pro 34 SL Pack for women gets you out on the trail with an advanced suspension that offers lightweight, breathable comfort and excellent load transfer. Slim-fitting, women-specific design has narrower, shorter shoulder straps and a shorter torso length compared to men's packs. Patented Aircomfort Pro suspension brings together top-notch ventilation, superb load transfer and a pivoting hipbelt. Mesh ventilated back holds the pack body away from your back, promoting fresh airflow and reducing perspiration. Spring steel wire design combined with a horizontal stay effectively transfer load weight to your hips. Padded Variflex hipbelt pivots at the center of your lower back, following your natural movement to help you keep your balance. Contoured, padded shoulder straps are lined with airy mesh for quick-drying breathability. Top-loading main compartment features zippered front access and a reservoir sleeve with a drink tube exit port that enables on-the-go hydration (reservoir sold separately). Front stash pocket, large bellowed side pockets and mesh side pockets help organize gear; separate zippered compartment for sleeping bag is accessible at the base of the pack. Top lid pocket holds your map, compass or GPS, spare batteries and other small equipment items; interior valuables pocket secures important items. Side compression straps cinch down loads for jostle-free carrying; attachment points allow you to lash trekking poles and ice tools to pack exterior. SOS label inside the lid. The Deuter Futura Pro 34 SL Pack lets you easily protect its contents with an integrated, removable raincover.
short_description: The Deuter Futura Pro 34 SL Pack for women gets you out on the trail with an advanced suspension that offers lightweight, breathable comfort and excellent load transfer.
